mapper.select: SELECT user_id, login_id, display_name, password, enabled, contact_phone, email, company_name, position, job_level, created_at, updated_at FROM bg_user WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND enabled = 1
SELECT user_id, login_id, display_name, enabled, contact_phone, email, company_name, position, job_level, created_at, updated_at FROM bg_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_id, login_id, display_name, enabled, contact_phone, email, company_name, position, job_level, created_at, updated_at FROM bg_user
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bg_user (login_id, display_name, password, enabled, email, contact_phone) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{displayName}, #{password}, true, #{email}, #{contactPhone})
